titleStmt.title: The prologve and epilogve to a comedie presented at the entertainment of the Prince His Highnesse by the schollers of Trinity College in Cambridge, in March last, 1642 by Francis Cole
titleStmt.author: Cowley, Abraham, 1618-1667.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Abraham Cowley--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
